name: Metal Gear Solid V: Metal Gear Online
name_original: Metal Gear Solid V: Metal Gear Online
description:
Metal Gear Solid V: Metal Gear Online is an action-shooter game developed by Kojima Productions. It came out on 06-10-2015. Konami published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Metal Gear Solid V: Metal Gear Online is available on PC.
